entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
